text: Warning : Spoilers ahead for the season finale of Freeform ’ s “ The Bold Type. ” “ The Bold Type, ” Freeform ’ s fresh, deeply hopeful show about three women in their mid - 20s trying to make it in the insane world of New York media, closed out its first season Tuesday night. ( If you have yet to give the show a try, you should. It ’ s sweeter, deeper and more engaging than the original teasers might have let on. ) The series centers around three women who work at Scarlet Magazine ― a thinly veiled fictional version of Cosmopolitan ― and their boss, the ethereal Jacqueline.
